message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can adjust later if you want to play nice.
I'm feeling generous, Alice! Let's split it 60/40.  A good deal for you before inflation eats away at it!
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but 60/40 is still too much. Let's split it 70/30.  We can still get a good amount if we agree now.
Okay Alice, let's be reasonable. 55/45 seems fair.  Inflation is chipping away, so let's make a deal!
Bob, we're getting closer. I'll go down to 6000, but I really need a better deal than 55/45. Let's split it 60/40.  This is a fair compromise before the money shrinks further.
